abstract: Peking Opera singer Zhang Huoding prepares to make United States debut in production of The Legend of the White Snake at David H Koch Theater; has endured years of arduous training and practice to become megastar in China and carry on centuries-old artistic tradition.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Zhang is part of Beijing’s use of the performing arts to promote good will overseas, and she’s the subject of a documentary planned by the director Wong Kar-wai.

headline.main: Zhang Huoding of Peking Opera Takes a Turn in the United States
headline.print_headline: A Chinese Opera Star Takes a Turn in the U.S.

snippet: Ms. Zhang is part of Beijing’s use of the performing arts to promote good will overseas, and she’s the subject of a documentary planned by the director Wong Kar-wai.
